bill.title: Public utilities; create "Mississippi Renewable Energy Development Act of 2010."
bill.description: An Act To Create The "mississippi Renewable Energy Development Act Of 2010"; To Provide Certain Definitions; To Provide That The Public Service Commission, After Opportunity For Public Comment, Shall Establish Appropriate Rates, Terms And Conditions For Net-metering Contracts; To Authorize The Commission To Allow An Electric Utility To Assess A Higher Fee For Net-metering Customers If Needed; To Require The Commission To Credit A Net-metering Customer With Any Accumulated Net Excess Generation; To Require Any Net Excess Generation Credit Remaining In A Net-metering Customer's Account To Expire At The Close Of An Annual Billing Cycle; To Provide That Any Renewable Energy Credit Created As The Result Of Electricity Supplied By A Net-metering Customer Is The Property Of Such Customer That Generated The Credit; And For Related Purposes.
